DOC.brief_summary: Our aim establish multi-center national Egyptian database information cerebrovascular stroke hemiplegia infant child 0 18 year age .
DOC.brief_title: National Egyptian Network Pediatric Stroke Hemiplegia Registry
DOC.detailed_description: Aims : An open-ended multi-center , national Egyptian study collect analyze data child cerebrovascular stroke hemiplegia . Participants : Eligible infant child stroke hemiplegia . DESIGN : This study prospective cohort study . Primary outcome measure : Initial acute stroke clinical radiological presentation , recurrent stroke , mortality , neurologic deficit acute stage , participant follow duration hospital stay , expect average 6 week
DOC.criteria: Focal neurological deficit acute onset last great 20 minute . And CT MRI show infarct location consistent neurological sign symptom Hemiplegia 1 . Cerebral haemorrhage associate ischemic infarct . 2 . Hypoxic ischemic event diffuse bilateral infarction alone .
